title: I need to find the name for this font
content:
Hi, Can someone help me find the name for the attached font? Thanks, Maria

Script font
text (35.1 k)

[‹ Ice cream retail graphics](http://web.archive.org/web/20080404180145/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10425 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ad feedback ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080404180145/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10411 "Go to next forum topic")
author: evittini2004

comments.content: Maria, can you upload a JPG? GIF? Also, go to the TYPE IDENTIFICATION area \< [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/83.html?1114031550](http://web.archive.org/web/20080404180145/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/83.html?1114031550)\> to post your request.
